title: Patient Emergency Contacts Schema
description:
Create Emergency Contact Data Schema

Design and implement a structured data schema for storing emergency contact information with comprehensive validation and data integrity.

Requirements:
- Define schema with the following fields:
  - Name: Full name of emergency contact (required, string)
  - Relationship: Type of relationship to user (required, string - e.g., spouse, parent, friend, colleague)
  - Phone: Contact phone number (required, string with format validation)
  - Address: Physical address information (optional, structured with street, city, state/province, postal code, country)
- Add appropriate data validation rules for each field
- Consider supporting multiple emergency contacts per user
- Include timestamps for created/updated dates
- Determine if any fields should allow multiple values (e.g., multiple phone numbers)
- Add unique identifiers for each emergency contact record
- Define constraints (e.g., phone number format, required vs optional fields)
- Consider privacy and security implications for storing sensitive contact data

Edge cases to handle:
- International phone number formats
- Incomplete address information
- Special characters in names
- Maximum length constraints for text fields
